seller_description: Pedigree Wet Dog Food for Puppies (Chicken & Liver Chunks in Gravy) is a 100% complete and balanced meal made with real meat and high-quality protein, offering a delicious, gravylicious flavor that puppies love. The quality ingredients ensure your puppy stays healthy and energetic, while the high moisture content helps keep them hydrated. This nutritious food supports strong muscles and bones with protein and calcium, promotes brain and vision development with DHA, and boosts natural defense with Vitamin E and Selenium. Available in a convenient bag, it's the perfect meal for growing puppies.
review: My 9 month puppy loved it. Packing was good and product was recently manufactured.
expected-output: The seller highlights Pedigree Wet Dog Food as a complete and balanced meal made with real meat and high-quality protein, offering a gravylicious flavor that puppies love. It is designed to maintain hydration with high moisture content and support strong muscles and bones with protein and calcium. Additionally, DHA promotes brain and vision development, while Vitamin E and Selenium boost natural defense. The buyer mentions their 9-month-old puppy loved the food, praised the intact packaging, and noted the product was recently manufactured and fresh. The seller's claims of nutritional benefits and puppy enjoyment align well with the buyer's positive experience. Recommendations for the seller include maintaining product freshness and packaging quality, emphasizing hydration benefits in marketing, and providing portion size guidelines based on age and weight to enhance customer satisfaction and proper feeding practices.
label: 1:Here buyer agreed with the seller
